fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Choose one of the random attributes you've received, and give it to any other player. You won't have it anymore, but your target will, permanently. They will be notified. 2 uses.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- At the start of each night, you will permanently gain a new attribute randomly selected from a random GIM role.
- However, there is a 33% chance you will instead explode and attack yourself without gaining anything.
- You cannot gain duplicate attributes, even if you've given them away previously.
- You cannot gain attributes that only exist to explain what a role's ability does.
- The explosion will bypass all of your randomly gained attributes.
- You cannot explode two nights in a row.
